fields.name: __Round Phases__
fields.value:
Phase 1: Betting
Phase 2: Initial Deal
Phase 3: Blackjack resolution
Phase 4: Player Turns
Phase 5: Dealer Turn
Phase 6: Payout

fields.name: __Phase 1: Betting__
fields.value: At the beginning of each round, all players place their bets.

fields.name: __Phase 2: Initial Deal__
fields.value: All players are dealt two cards face-up and the dealer receives two cards, one face-up and another face-down.

fields.name: __Phase 3: Blackjack Resolution__
fields.value:
If you're dealt a 10 value card and an Ace as your first two cards that means you got a Blackjack.

**Blackjack Resolution - No Dealer Blackjack:**
You are paid 1.5 times your wager immediately, without playing through the round

**Blackjack Resolution - Dealer Blackjack:**
You don't win anything, your bet is returned to you.

fields.name: __Phase 4: Player Turns__
fields.value:
Starting to the left of the dealer, each player is given a chance to draw more cards.The players can either 'hit' or 'stand'.

**Player Turn - Hit:**
If the player calls out 'HIT', they are given an extra card. The player can 'HIT' as many times as they wish, but have to aim not to 'bust' (exceed a total of 21). If the player busts, they immediately lose their bet.

**Player Turn - Stand:**
They can call 'STAND' if they do not wish to draw any more cards.

fields.name: __Phase 5: Dealer Turn__
fields.value:
After each player has played and either stood or busted, the dealer takes their turn. The dealer, again, either 'HIT' or 'STAND', but must hit until their cards reach a total value of 17 or more.

**Dealer Turn - Dealer Busts:**
If the dealer's hand exceeds 21, all players who didn't bust win immediately - their bet is returned along with a matching amount from the dealer's bank.

fields.name: __Phase 6: Payout__
fields.value:
This phase is only reached if the dealer hasn't busted. Each player who hasn't busted compares their hand to the dealer's to determine their outcome. Each player's hand's cards are totalled and compared to the dealer's.

**Payout - Player Wins:**
Player's bet is returned along with a matching amount from the dealer's bank.

**Payout - Player Loses:**
Player loses their bet.

**Payout - Player Ties:**
Player's original bet is returned to the player.

fields.name: __Card Values__
fields.value: All number cards (2-10) score the value indicated on them. The face cards (Jack, Queen, King) score 10 points and Ace can either be treated as 1 or 11. A perfect hand combines an ace with a 10, Jack, Queen or King and is known as a 'Blackjack'.
